weekly_top_story.headline: European Union and Mercosur formally sign free trade agreement after 25 years of negotiations
weekly_top_story.summary: The EU-Mercosur deal opens markets for €160 billion in trade, boosting economic ties between Europe and South America while advancing sustainable development standards amid global trade tensions.

stories.headline: High Seas Treaty enters into force in 60 United Nations member states
stories.summary: The treaty's activation enables enhanced protection of international waters, covering nearly half of Earth's surface and addressing biodiversity loss in areas beyond national jurisdiction.

stories.headline: Thousands protest U.S. takeover proposal in Copenhagen and Nuuk amid Greenland crisis
stories.summary: Mass rallies highlight tensions over potential U.S. control of Greenland, raising questions about Arctic sovereignty, NATO dynamics, and resource competition in a warming climate.

stories.headline: Flash floods strike northern South Africa, killing at least 19 and affecting neighboring countries
stories.summary: Deadly floods in South Africa, spilling into Mozambique and Zimbabwe, underscore escalating climate risks in southern Africa, displacing communities and straining regional disaster response.
